comments.author: Anhim.3156
comments.body: You are in the wrong sub-forum for this kind of question

comments.author: Orianna.6183
comments.body:
I would like to ask if PVP Ranked Servers and Unranked Servers are the same.

I remember during off-season I regularly queued unranked and had quite stable pings.

Now S5 begins and everytime I queue rank thereâ€™s always some spikes (sometimes as high as 2k ping).

Is it because they are using different servers or server reaching capacity due to all the players returning? If the latter, can Anet look into them to improve player experience globally?
